artist: Artist: Fly NYC; Publisher: Victoria Anarchist Bookfair, Victoria, Canada
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of four figures holding books, with text, printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers;16 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Victoria Anarchist Book Fair 2008
